Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~denyeart CLI is a tool with a narrow scope (mainly for dev activities). QSCC APIs are mainly for use from SDKs which will provide controlled access via covering APIs (as opposed to calling chaincode directly). Users can pretty much call any chaincode from CLI and it would need deep introspection skills to decipher and pretty print arbitrary "invoke/query" calls. Beyond its scope, I'd say.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Thanks ~muralisr . I will close the work item and ask the tester to use SDK once the APIs are available via SDK.
